Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT VALUE(SUM(T3.IMPMORNATU)0)
FROM seguros.v0cliente
 
WHERE T1.CGCCPF        =  :seguros.v0cliente.CGCCPF
  AND T2.CODCLIEN      =  T1.COD_CLIENTE
  AND T2.NUM_APOLICE   =  :V0PRODUTOSVG.NUM_APOLICE
  AND T2.CODSUBES      =  :V0PRODUTOSVG.CODSUBES
  AND T2.SITUACAO  IN ('0','1','3','6')
; AND T2.SITUACAO  NOT IN ('2','4')
  AND T2.NRCERTIF <> :seguros.v0cliente.NRCERTIF
  AND T2.NRCERTIF      =  T3.NRCERTIF
  AND T3.DTTERVIG      =  '9999-12-31'
/
 END SQL
